FuncDef:
The remote-attestation source-interface command binds remote attestation to a specified interface.
The undo remote-attestation source-interface command deletes the binding between an interface and remote attestation.
By default, remote attestation is not bound to an interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After remote attestation is configured, to configure an interface used to establish a connection between a device and a remote attestation server, run the remote-attestation source-interface command on the device.
